author: bharath.vedartham
content:
With ePBS, we have had conversations on deprecating MEV-Boost and absorbing it into clients. I wrote a simple PR to the builder-specs against the staked builder api to define a whitelisted builder configuration spec across clients: https://github.com/ethereum/builder-specs/pull/144 this has been inspired from: https://hackmd.io/@tchain/payment-config
Would love to get a check from clients on:
1. Whether we want to deprecate MEV-Boost in glamsterdam. I think we can have a discussion on how it would be to absorb mev-boost into clients. 
2. Whether we need to specify the cnofiguration passed to clients to keep it standardized across implementations.

author: bharath.vedartham
content: in my mind, clients would have to specify a list of whitelisted builders alongside with their corresponding parameters like min_bid, max_trusted_bid and it is upto implementations on how they send validator registrations and query bids
